name: Regular Show: Battle of the Behemoths
summary: Battle of the Behemoths is an all-out duel of destruction between Regular Show's most colossal characters. Go one vs. one against gigantic warriors like Baby Ducks, Evil Geese, Guardian of Secrets, VCR-bitrator, Snowballs and the Warlock. Each character has an arsenal of kicks, punches and unique special moves to take down your opponent.
